item.title: LfE 24: Volcano Sunset
item.description: 20/04/2010   Hello, As you all probably know, the Iceland Volcano continues to erupt disrupting flights all over northern Europe. My flatmate who was supposed to go to Germany for part of her PhD has been grounded here.
